reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, comfortable, and soft, with one mentioning it's not itchy at all. They appreciate its fit, warmth, and quality, with one noting it keeps them warm without being too heavy.

items.author: Joel chavez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: Love this sweater! Itâ€™s so cute and super comfy! Solid knit - but being itâ€™s still far too warm for it I havenâ€™t worn it for any extended period so I canâ€™t comment on if it will pill. I will update once itâ€™s cold enough to wear around for a while. Based on the measurements I sized down one and Iâ€™m glad I did because it definitely wouldâ€™ve been too oversized for me if I went with my usual size. So consider that and check the size chart depending on the fit you want! But definitely fun and festive! Ready for witchmas ðŸŽƒ â€”â€”- Edit: so this is romwe lol. I happened to stumble across itâ€¦ elsewhere. It explains the quality. Romwe IS actually solid clothing, and tbf you donâ€™t have to wait to get it here. But in my experience with other romwe knits (which I own), it does pill fairly easily. I still havenâ€™t gotten a chance to wear it because weâ€™re not allowed cold weather, apparently. Tbh when I bought it for $23 or whatever it was definitely worth it. But the current $40 price isnâ€™t completely unreasonable, truthfully, considering Amazon prime delivery & no tariff risk. But I felt it should be transparent what youâ€™re getting since a lot of people arenâ€™t familiar or donâ€™t shop around. Itâ€™s good quality, but be prepared with a fabric shaver. Read more
items.author: Kayla H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crazy Cat Lady Dream
items.body: OBSESSED with this sweater. Great quality and super warm. I want one in every color! True to size, I am 160lb and 5â€™8 - I got an XL Read more
items.author: Heather Oddie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10, no notes
items.body: Well made, very comfortable, and adorable. Very glad I found this sweater! itâ€™s SO CUTE Read more
items.author: A Kaz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and soft but not sure how long it will last
items.body: The lighting in my house sucks so in my pics the one where it's the most green is most representative of the actual color. This sweater is adorable and it's very soft and doesn't make me itchy. It's nice and roomy. I've worn this a handful of times and I notice the bottom and the sleeve holes are starting to stretch a little and become wavy, see pics. There's a little bit of pilling starting to happen. I think I'll only get one winter out of it as far as wearing it out of the house, because I think it will start to look messy, but I'll wear it at home for a long time after because it's comfy. I would buy it again. Read more
items.author: Kg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels nice
items.body: I like it! At 1st I was skeptical about ordering online because I like to feel the fabric of stuff 1st. Especially sweater because they tend to be itchy. This ones not itchy at all and feels nice. The fit is pretty good. Amazon recommended a small so I went with a small and im 5'2" about 130lbs. Read more
items.author: Jamie Creps

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Grey and Black, Beige, Purple, Black and White, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
